txt.en:
'We will need to fell many of the trees around the camp, but it wouldn't do to strip the forest bare.'

He hands you a map of the Ringl√≥ Vale with a small section of the nearby woods marked off.

'Explore this area and mark down the locations of any young trees you find. We'll leave them be until they're old enough.'
This tree is too young to fell
Oristor needs help identifying which trees around the lumber camp are old enough for felling, and which are too young.\n\nExamine some trees around the lumber camp.
This tree is too young to fell
This lively tree is too young to fell
You have finished your survey of the trees, and should report back to Oristor with your findings.\n\nOristor can be found at the lumber camp near Ethring.
This young tree thinks it knows better than its elders. Ah, youth.
This tree is but a babe, and has so much of the world to see.
This tree doesn't care whether you mark it as safe to fell or not. You mark it anyway.
The workers at Ethring's lumber camp need to identify which trees are too young to harvest.
